body:
Hi,

I have started to get this error when trying to use both Ladybug + Honeybee. Does anyone have any suggestions for how to fix this please?

Thank you!

replies.body:
I assume this is an issue with GHPython and not ladybug + honeybee. Missing methods are usually a result of having an old Rhino. Update Rhino to solve the problem. Mine is: Version 5 SR12 64-bit
(5.12.50810.13095, 08/10/2015)

Thank you very much for getting back to me. I don't think the Rhino version is the problem. I am using the same version as you (5.12.50810.13095, 08/10/2015). I tried running the GHPython separately and this works with no problem. I am not that experienced with Rhino so please excuse me if I'm not understanding properly. Is there something else you think I should try please?
